title: Tiger on the Beat
actors: Chow Yun-Fat,Conan Lee,Nina Li Chi,Shirley Ng,James Wong Jim,Ti Lung,Gordon Liu Chia-Hui,Norman Chu,Phillip Ko,Shing Fui-On,David Chiang Da-Wei,Lydia Shum Tin-Ha,Bruce Lau Kar-Wing,Lam Fai-Wong,Xiong Xin-Xin
summary: A seasoned cop and his rookie partner are a pair of mismatched partners in this Hong Kong action-comedy in the style of 'Lethal Weapon'. The wacky twosome are up in arms as they try to solve the murder of a heroin trafficker.
